testcase.name: throws exception when base JSON file does not exist
throws exception when env JSON file does not exist
throws exception when single environment variable is invalid JSON
throws exception when command line override is invalid JSON
merges JSON as expected when base and env files exist
applies single JSON environment variable as expected
applies command line override as expected
merges JSON as expected when env file is not specified
merges JSON as expected when the base file extension is customised
concatenates env JSON file arrays onto base arrays
concatenates environment variable arrays onto arrays when using [] pattern
replaces array elements with those defined in environment variables when using [n] pattern
merges array elements as expected with environment variables when using mixed patterns
concatenates override variable arrays onto arrays when using [] pattern
replaces array elements with those defined in command line override properties when using [n] pattern
merges arrays from four sources as expected
